评论详情: I recommend very good quality full of stretch very comfortable.

Update 12/24 The inner thigh areas pilled after 2 washes and wear. After 8mo holes formed. Not acceptable for me and will not get again.  I wash warm with non abrasive chemical free detergent and med heat dry for 30-45 min. My other brands of scrubs generally last 3 years.  Side note: these look like genie pants around the ankle.  Update: The XL fits better and they definitely shrunk a bit after wash and dry. So since all my scrubs have been a L I'd say these run a little small or are very fit forming. I would have liked better separate XL pant and L top. 5'6" short torso, 170lbs, 40C bust. I ended up cutting the x in the front. Looked odd and loose on me. Did soften up after a couple wash and wears.  Original review: It's impossible to find 100% cotton these days, especially in the jogger pants and more flattering tops. I hate poly... it's hot and stiff. I thought since this has rayon (still a plastic fabric) it would be softer. Meh. I usually wear L in scrubs but these feel too snug for me. Particularly the buttocks... they make me feel like I have a big rear lol which I don't. I'm going to order an XL and compare. But I dislike the feel of the fabric on my skin as of now.
